Class DisplayerPropertyFileGenerator

java.lang.Object
  org.jhove2.app.util.PropertyFileGenerator
      org.jhove2.app.util.DisplayerPropertyFileGenerator

public class DisplayerPropertyFileGenerator
extends PropertyFileGenerator

Class to generate editable Java properties file for Displayer settings for Reportable features

Author:
smorrissey

Description copied from class: PropertyFileGenerator
Method to create actual list of possible property values (may be an empty list, as for units properties file)

Specified by:
createPropertyValues in class PropertyFileGenerator
Returns:

main

public static void main(String[] args)
Main method invoked to generate Displayer properties files.

Parameters:
args - 2 arguments: fully qualified class name for Reportable class for which property file is to be generated, and directory path to which file should be written File with be written to base-path plus sub-directories corresponding to class's package name, and file will have name baseclassname_displayer.properties
